about.chooseus1_desc: Our Workers are Skilled, background-checked Indian professionals dedicated to quality and trust.
about.chooseus2_desc: We’re punctual, friendly, professional, and always deliver a respectful, positive experience every visit.
about.chooseus3_desc: High satisfaction, trusted reputation, and happy clients—we leave every space sparkling and inviting.
about.chooseus4_desc: We use advanced equipment, safe products, and careful methods to ensure perfect, healthy results
about.desc1: At Cleaning Llama, we believe a spotless space fuels a happier, healthier life. Proudly based in Saudi Arabia, our dedicated team of experienced professionals—each trained in top-quality standards—delivers reliable, detail-driven cleaning with a smile. Whether it’s your home, office, or commercial space, we’re here to make every corner shine, so you can focus on what matters most.
about.heading: Your Trusted Cleaning Partners in Saudi Arabia
about.mission_desc: To deliver exceptional cleaning services that create healthier, happier environments for our clients. We are committed to reliability, transparency, and utmost care in every corner we clean—always striving for excellence and a personal touch.
about.story_desc: Cleaning Llama began with a simple mission: to raise the standard of cleanliness and customer care in Saudi Arabia. Founded by a team who understands the value of a fresh, welcoming space, we’ve grown from a small operation to a trusted local brand. Over the years, our reputation has been built on integrity, dedication, and consistently delivering exceptional results
about.vision_desc: To be Saudi Arabia’s most trusted cleaning service, renowned for professionalism, integrity, and innovative solutions. We aim to elevate the standard of cleanliness while building lasting relationships with both clients and our dedicated team.

contact.desc1: At Cleaning Llama, we believe everyone deserves a fresh, healthy space to live and work. Our mission goes beyond just scrubbing and sweeping – it’s about creating environments that uplift, inspire, and promote wellbeing
contact.desc2: Reaching out is simple. Click the button below or visit our contact page to get started. If you have quick queries, feel free to connect with us directly via email, WhatsApp, or a quick call—whichever works best for you. Let Cleaning Llama help you enjoy sparkling clean spaces with zero hassle. Your comfort and happiness are our top priorities!
contact.heading: Ready for a cleaner home?
contact.subheading: We love making spaces shine. Reach out and let’s get started!

home.about_description: We are a professional cleaning service dedicated to delivering a flawless and healthy environment for your home or office. Our expert team provides a comprehensive clean with unmatched attention to detail, so you can enjoy a spotless space.
home.about_heading: Our Professional Expertise Guarantees a Spotless Finish
home.aboutItem1_subheading: We have served Saudi Arabia for 30 years, giving us experience in handling every cleaning challenge with proven, reliable methods.
home.aboutItem2_subheading: Professional Indian Staffs deliver meticulous, detailed cleaning with a trusted work ethic and a commitment to clear communication.
home.aboutItem3_subheading: Our volume proves our reliability and customer loyalty. Join the tens of thousands of clients who trust us for a perfect clean every time.
home.aboutItem4_subheading: As a fully established, local business, we understand the standards and specific needs of communities across Riyadh and Jeddah
home.hero_subheading: We clean meticulously so you can enjoy sophisticated elegance.
home.services_subheading: We offer a wide range of expert cleaning solutions tailored to your unique needs with quality and professionalism.
home.service1_subheading: Professional furniture cleaning for sofas, carpets, mattresses, and more-reviving freshness, removing stains, and enhancing home hygiene.
home.service2_subheading: Our Hourly Cleaning Service offers flexible, high-quality cleaning, at Floor, Kitchen & Utensils, and Bathroom Tasks, Including heavier duties.
home.service3_subheading: Our Rehabilitation Cleaning Service include Floor, Facade, Window, Kitchen, Bathroom, and Tank Cleaning (Upper & Lower).
home.service4_subheading: Professional Pest Control Services Eliminating all types of Pests and Insects—Delivered with Expert Care and Reliability.
home.service5_subheading: Comprehensive Home Maintenance Covering Electrical, Plumbing, AC repair, AC cleaning and Leak Detection for Lasting Comfort and Safety.
home.service6_subheading: Eco-safe air conditioner cleaning that removes dust, sanitizes coils and filters, boosts cooling efficiency, and protects your family’s health.
home.service7_subheading: Safe and efficient furniture moving service—ensuring careful handling and protection of your belongings.

footer.heading: Your trusted, professional cleaning service for a sparkling home or office. Book with us today!
